content: this pattern is also available for free on my blog 1 seashore headband is a quick and comfy ear warming headband - perfect for winter strolls it s worked flat using fisherman s rib stitch and sewn at the end to create the twist join this pattern has been tech edited and test knit **sizes** width 12 5 cm 5 circumference - adjustable **yarn & yardage** yardages for 50 - 60 cm 20 - 24 head circumferences approx 60 - 70 m 65 - 75 yds of nepal drops yarn 65% wool 35% alpaca 75 m 82 yds per 50 g or similar worsted / aran weight category 4 - medium yarn sample worked in colorway blush **needles & notions** needles 5 mm us 8 straight or circular needles or to fit gauge notions tapestry needle scissors tape measure **gauge** 12 stitches x 32 row in 10x10 cm 4x4 in fisherman s rib stitch blocked 1 https //whileberry com/blog/seashore-headband-knitting-pattern
